title: "Planned ‘fixes’ for credit-card interchange fees will actually make fraud easier"
excerpt: "The US Federal Reserve and the US Senate are both looking to lessen restrictions on retailers — ostensibly to rein in card fees. What they actually are doing is inviting more fraud."
